alert.note: Alert for Maryland Beaches (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 18 at 7:01PM EST until December 18 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 7 to 10 feet in the surf zone. * WHERE...Maryland Beaches County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. OCEAN CITY INLET MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.5 FT, MAJOR 3.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 19/12 AM 2.4 -0.1 0.5 1 NONE 19/12 PM 1.3 -1.2 -0.7 1 NONE 20/02 AM 1.5 -1.0 -0.5 1 NONE 20/02 PM 2.2 -0.3 0.2 1 NONE 21/04 AM 2.7 0.2 0.6 1 NONE 21/03 PM 3.1 0.6 1.1 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions.
